cd /Users/karpel/Documents/GitHub/proof-of-funds/smart-contracts && (echo "const ethers = require('ethers'); const provider = new ethers.providers.JsonRpcProvider('http://localhost:8545'); async function checkTx() { const receipt = await provider.getTransactionReceipt('0x2dd97ac4e5da716a707314af0766293d27b72728b8c8925b2d90764e2921eea4'); console.log(receipt); } checkTx().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(console.error);" | npx hardhat console --network localhost)
